name: Zopa
description:
At Zopa, we’re shaping the future of finance.

We offer simple loans and smart investments that help people take control of their finances and do more with their money. In the 12 years we’ve been in business, we’ve helped more than 60,000 people lend over £2 billion to 246,000 UK consumers.

And our journey’s only just beginning. In November 2016 we announced our plans to build a next-generation bank so that we can bring a greater range of smart, ethical finance products to even more people.

name: Zego
description:
Zego has developed an on demand pay-as-you-go insurance technology specifically for gig economy drivers.  Insurance cover is bought directly through our app, where drivers top up their account like a pay-as-you-go mobile. The technology allows us to track when drivers are working so cover automatically switches on and off. 
Zego partners directly with work platforms such as Deliveroo and Uber, ensuring that their work forces are covered at the level they need when they need it.

name: TransFICC
description:
One API for eTrading - for Fixed Income and Derivatives

TransFICC has built a technology solution for banks and the buy-side, delivering: 

- One API - Translates 230 Execution Venue API’s to a single API. Clients connect once to TransFICC, saving hours of coding, testing and upgrades.
- Fast, secure and scalable technology, using SBE, Aeron and Disruptor. Institutions can keep pace with price updates and not get beaten to trades.
- A normalised price/order timestamp to the millisecond level.

description:

name: TALENT MONTREAL
description:
Home to numerous world-class research labs, Montreal houses the largest academic concentration of AI professionals in the world with over 250 researchers and doctoral students in AI related fields. 
If that wasn’t enough, Montreal offers a safe and welcoming city with a rich multicultural fabric and thriving arts, food and culture. Montreal is definitely THE place to be.
Come and meet IVADO Labs and B-YOND! They'll tell you all about the work opportunities Montreal offers to professionals in AI

name: Panaseer
description:
Panaseer's mission is to help Security Leaders answer the all-important question, "How secure are we?". We firmly believe this question can only be answered through the application of data science: in the words of William Edwards Deming, “In God we trust; all others must bring data”. 

Our team is comprised of engineers, data scientists and cyber security domain experts with significant experience in identifying the most sophisticated attacks on large, well-protected organisations.

name: OurPath
description: OurPath is a digital lifestyle change programme aiming to tackle the growing lifestyle disease epidemic. We’re a talented young team building one of the fastest growing companies in Europe. As the UK’s leading live-in care provider, we believe when you get older you should be able to stay in your own home. Not move to a care home.  

We use the power of tech to personally-match mums, dads, aunties, and uncles in need of support to expert live-in carers. The result? Home care that really feels like family. If you want to do something great and be part of something big, we waiting to hear from you.

name: EDITED
description: EDITED is the world's leading provider of real-time data and insights to help retailers get product and pricing right. Using artificial intelligence, machine learning and big data analytics, EDITED helps buyers, planners and trading teams at brands like Topshop, Net-A-Porter and Ralph Lauren generate a huge competitive advantage. For more information, visit www.edited.com.

Alpha is Telefonica's Moonshot factory,  headquartered in Barcelona, Spain.
